member.name: T:MGFramework.InputModule.MobileGraphicRaycaster
member.summary: A derived BaseRaycaster to raycast against Graphic elements. Ming Modify 优化GraphicRayCaster，用于移动端节省时耗 1、修改部分常用变量的取值逻辑 2、去除不常用的2 3D物体遮挡逻辑 3、去除多屏适配，移动端默认单屏 4、去除忽略翻转判断，默认可响应翻转

member.name: P:MGFramework.InputModule.MobileGraphicRaycaster.sortOrderPriority
member.summary: Priority of the raycaster based upon sort order.

member.name: P:MGFramework.InputModule.MobileGraphicRaycaster.renderOrderPriority
member.summary: Priority of the raycaster based upon render order.

member.name: P:MGFramework.InputModule.MobileGraphicRaycaster.eventCamera
member.summary: The camera that will generate rays for this raycaster.
member.returns: - Null if Camera mode is ScreenSpaceOverlay or ScreenSpaceCamera and has no camera. - canvas.worldCanvas if not null - Camera.main. - Ming Modify 只在初始化的时候赋值，节省获取Camera.main的时耗，提供一个刷新方法以供动态改变摄像机

member.param: List of hit objects to append new results to.

members.member: A Task object represents a coroutine. Tasks can be started, paused, and stopped. It is an error to attempt to start a task that has been stopped or which has naturally terminated.
Returns true if and only if the coroutine is running. Paused tasks are considered to be running.
Returns true if and only if the coroutine is currently paused.
Delegate for termination subscribers. manual is true if and only if the coroutine was stopped with an explicit call to Stop().
Termination event. Triggered when the coroutine completes execution.

Creates a new Task object for the given coroutine.
If autoStart is true (default) the task is automatically started upon construction.
Discontinues execution of the coroutine at its next yield.

member.name: T:MGFramework.TaskQueue
member.summary: 任务队列 在某个时间点最多只有一个协程在执行，先加入队列中的先执行，后加入的后执行
